text: Trade drinks with another player for the rest of the round
Someone else picks your next drink
Wear a piece of clothing from Mom's closet for the remainder of the round
You must hold your drink in the air for the rest of the round
Take 2 sips for every wrong answer you give for the rest of the round
Someone else chooses your next trivia question
Do the next challenge twice if chosen
You must wear another players socks on your hands for the remainder of the round, group chooses who's socks
The player to your left answers the next question for you, if they miss it you drink
Mimic another player every round until the end of the game, if someone notices you not doing it, you drink
